metadata.title: Friday, 6th December, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development whether the Government has any plans to extend the Zesco Power lines from Lukona to Mapungu and Tapo Health Centre via Ngunyama in Kalabo Central Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Agriculture and Livestock when the Government will post a District Veterinary Officer to Solwezi District.
